General.Name: Reach Energy Bhd
General.Description: Reach Energy Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, development, and sale of crude oil and other petroleum products in Malaysia and internationally. The company holds a 100% working interest in the Emir-Oil concession block covering an area of approximately 850.3 square kilometers located in the Mangystau Oblast in the southwestern region of the Republic of Kazakhstan. It also exports its products. Reach Energy Berhad was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
